Celebrate the 40th anniversary of Virago Modern Classics with these stunning new editions

Written by Alice Violett · Published Apr 25, 2018

Publisher Virago are marking the 40th anniversary of their Modern Classics novels with a set of deluxe reissues, designed by Hannah Wood and featuring artwork by Yehrin Tong.

As well as some of the best novels published by women in the past four decades, the collection includes a hardback anthology, Writers as Readers: a celebration of Virago Modern Classics. In this book, contributors including Maggie Oâ€™Farrell, Zadie Smith and Sandi Toksvig reflect upon the treasures of the Virago Modern Classics collection.

Alice Violett

I write and edit content for the Suffolk Libraries website. Visit my website.
